title: Pixel 2xl keeps restarting
content:
My pixel 2xl has been restarting on it's own for about 2 weeks now. I tried starting it in recovery mode, but no avail. Also tried safe mode but nothing.
Sometimes when it shuts off, I have to charge it before it boots
Next step is to reset, I want to know if that will work
I don't know what is causing all of thisðŸ˜­
